description: Focuses on integrating cybernetic enhancements for increased physical power.

9.name: Strength Augmentation
9.special: 20% chance to increase user's strength by 5% for 2 turns

7.name: Cybernetic Punch
7.special: 15% chance to cause internal damage (additional 5 physical damage per turn for 2 turns)

6.name: Neural Disruptor
6.special: 25% chance to disrupt target's neural system, paralyzing them for 1 turn

5.name: Hydraulic Strike
5.special: Reduces target's defense by 10% for 3 turns

4.name: Power Surge
4.special: 30% chance to reduce target's energy by 20% for 2 turns

3.name: Adaptive Strike
3.special: 35% chance to paralyze target for 1 turn

2.name: System Overload
2.special: 40% chance to stun target for 1 turn

1.name: Ultimate Strike
1.special: 50% chance to reduce target's action points by 2 for 2 turns

0.name: Full System Assault
0.special: 60% chance to paralyze target for 2 turns

additional_effects.enhanced_vision: Increases accuracy by 10%, allowing for critical hits.
additional_effects.neural_uplinks: Reduces action point cost by 1 for all implant attacks.
additional_effects.energy_core: Increases energy reserves by 20%, allowing for prolonged combat.
